job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>JOB DESCRIPTION</strong></p><p>Doron Precision Systems, Inc. is a world leader in driving simulation systems and now has an opening for a full-time Software Engineer in Binghamton, New York.</p><p><br></p><p><strong>REQUIREMENTS</strong></p><ul><li>Bachelor's degree in Engineering or Computer Science is required.</li><li>2-4 years related experience.</li><li>Design and programming experience with C, C++ (OOP), Microsoft Visual Studio.</li><li>Software development experience both in a team environment as well as working independently.</li><li>Significant experience with Windows UI and application development.</li><li>Experience with Interface Control Requirements and Documentation.</li><li>Background in real-time simulation and/or game development.</li><li>Some minimal travel may be required.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>PREFERRED</strong></p><ul><li>Working knowledge of vehicle dynamics.</li><li>Experience interfacing to I/O hardware and real-time control loops.</li><li>Experience developing and working with distributed network applications</li></ul><p><br></p><p><strong>JOB DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES</strong></p><ul><li>Responsible for the research, design and writing of software for Company Products.</li><li>Supports/installs software applications/systems.</li><li>Tests new and existing software for faults and corrects any deficiencies.</li><li>Modifies existing programs by analyzing and identifying areas for modification and improvement.</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p><p><br></p>
